name: Blaster_Barrage
display_help:
You fire off a barrage of energy blasts from an advanced energy drone dealing Moderate energy damage to foes in long cone in front of you.

You must be at least level 14 and have two other Gadgetry powers before selecting Drone Barrage.

Damage: Light.
Recharge: Slow.
